events.name: lithium-ion recycling
events.wd_description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling.
events.description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling.

events.name: pyrometallurgy
events.wd_description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal.
events.description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal.

events.name: hydrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Hydrometallurgy employs specialized solution reagents to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Hydrometallurgy employs specialized solution reagents to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: bioleaching
events.wd_description: The bioleaching technique uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow and are easily susceptible to contamination.
events.description: The bioleaching technique uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow and are easily susceptible to contamination.

events.name: North American Lithium Projects
events.wd_description: North American lithium projects are making significant progress, with several in production and others in the development phase.
events.description: North American lithium projects are making significant progress, with several in production and others in the development phase.

events.name: Tanco Project
events.wd_description: The Tanco project in Canada is a significant contributor to North America's lithium supply, with ongoing production.
events.description: The Tanco project in Canada is a significant contributor to North America's lithium supply, with ongoing production.

events.name: NAL Project
events.wd_description: The NAL project in Canada continues stable production, adding to the region's lithium output.
events.description: The NAL project in Canada continues stable production, adding to the region's lithium output.

events.name: New Projects
events.wd_description: New projects such as James Bay, Nemaska, and Carolina are expected to enhance North America's lithium production capacity significantly.
events.description: New projects such as James Bay, Nemaska, and Carolina are expected to enhance North America's lithium production capacity significantly.

events.name: Pilgangoora Project
events.wd_description: The Pilgangoora project, owned by Pilbara Minerals, continues to increase its production capacity with planned expansions to reach 1 million tons per year by 2025.
events.description: The Pilgangoora project, owned by Pilbara Minerals, continues to increase its production capacity with planned expansions to reach 1 million tons per year by 2025.

events.name: Expansion Plans
events.wd_description: Expansion projects P680 and P1000 at Pilgangoora are on track, with production capacity expected to reach 1 million tons per year by the first half of 2025.
events.description: Expansion projects P680 and P1000 at Pilgangoora are on track, with production capacity expected to reach 1 million tons per year by the first half of 2025.
